thread.title: Mom Quits Her Job To Travel The World With Her 6-Year-Old Daughter
thread.title_full: Mom Quits Her Job To Travel The World With Her 6-Year-Old Daughter

author: James Gould-Bourn
title: Mom Quits Her Job To Travel The World With Her 6-Year-Old Daughter
text: Their destinations include Indonesia, Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, UK, France, and China Thanks for sharing!
